summary: Completed comprehensive testing of LearnSphere educational tutoring platform. Backend APIs fully functional (8/8 tests passed). Frontend core functionality working with minor overlay issue identified in auto-popup modal behavior.

ui_bugs.issue: Auto-popup modal overlay blocks subsequent user interactions after 8 seconds, preventing clicks on other elements

passed_tests: Landing page loads with all sections
Demo modal opens and form validation works
Demo form submission successful with success state
Admin page loads with stats cards
Admin bookings table displays data correctly
Navigation scroll links work for most sections
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix auto-popup modal overlay issue - modal blocks interactions after it appears. Consider adding a proper close mechanism or reducing z-index conflicts.
